paper_title: Deep learning accelerated phase prediction of refractory multi-principal element alloys

claims.claim: The trained MLP achieves a per-class (binary) F1 score of approximately 0.98 for the BCC phase on the testing dataset
instruction: The notebook loads the trained MLP model and the testing dataset, performs multi-label phase prediction, computes a per-class confusion matrix for each phase, and evaluates the per-class (binary) F1 score
Verify that the printed per-class F1 score for the BCC phase is 0.98 (Â±0.05)
